ðŸŒ– Ask me about cryptography, web of trust, terraform, kubernetes, dotnet

ðŸŒ— Fun fact:
ðŸŒ˜ Imagine a software museum - a place where ancient code artifacts are preserved. In one wing, you'll find the fossilized remains of proprietary software, encased in amber. In the next room, open-source exhibits thrive, humming with community spirit. My professional endeavors, shrouded in the clandestine folds of closed-source intellectual property, remain hidden from the world. A paradox unfolds - a lifetime dedicated to work that swells with pride, yet yields naught tangible to display.
